review: The behaviour of the doctor is very good as well as I am very much satisfied with his treatment. Staffs are very polite and cordial. The service that they provided it was extraordinary.  Overall I would recommend everyone to visit Beliaghata Apollo Clinic due to his maintained hospitality, cleanliness and affordable services.

context: Type 2 Diabetes Treatment,  Diabetes and diabetes complication management ,
review: Visited for my mother | my mother is a patient of Hypertension, Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus, Dyslipidemia | Doctor Bhaduri is very polite and he listens all problems and discusses with us about reasons and remedies of those problems | Also discusses about if he prescribes new medicine and why such medicine is given | My mother is extremely happy and satisfied about his treatment and behavior | My mother is fortunate for being treated by him | Pranam
